forums.title: Bug Bounty Hunting with Dipesh Bohara
forums.description: Join us as Dipesh Bohara, a renowned bug bounty hunter, shares his story and process. Dipesh has won bounties for finding critical security bugs on various applications, including Facebook by Meta, and was awarded $5250 just yesterday.

forums.title: Software Development: From Engineer's Desk to User's Device
forums.description: Our moderator Satya Raj Awasthi will lead the forum on Software Development: From Engineer's Desk to User's Device. He will share his real-world experience on how software is taken from design and development to production.

forums.title: Freelancing for Beginners
forums.description: Our first Friday Forum, led by Bibek Dhakal, delved into the world of freelancing for beginners. Bibek shared invaluable insights to empower our community members on their freelance journey.
